data.text: @KevinRothrock Wasn't there a James Bond movie where a button like that opened up the floor and they fell into a crocodile pen?
@KevinRothrock later  they will say that they were his hostages
@KevinRothrock It's not COVID he's worried about, it's the Stauffenberg flu...
@StephenPihlaja @jhendo14lfc @KevinRothrock Haha I'm no Russia expert but I do know what paranoid murderous dictators would do some shit like this. Can't trust anyone when you're a hated emperor! 😅
@niner_raccoon @jhendo14lfc @KevinRothrock it certainly appears that way to me, a Russia expert for the last 5 days.
@user_proud @KevinRothrock "For taking over the city of Mariopol, you may take 20 steps towards Czar Putin and receive 30 millions rubles in gold as a gift"

@StephenPihlaja @jhendo14lfc @KevinRothrock As a KGB killer he knows all too well that it takes just a prick from a poison pen or a radioactive umbrella or something brought in by the officials. That's why he's sitting so far away from them.
@KevinRothrock I think there is something else going on here, that distance is extreme for Covid unless he has some serious comorbidities. Is he paranoid?
